root.name: Sixty Second Shooter Deluxe
root.description: OverviewSixty Second Shooter Deluxe is an improved version Happion Laboratories' Sixty Second Shooter made for PlayStation Mobile. It is a dual-joystick shooter score attack game where you have sixty seconds to destroy as many enemies as possible.The game was made by Schizoid creator and former Treyarch creative director Jamie Fristrom.
